scrDist.Description: Distance between the screen center and the eye.

stimOri.Description: Orientation of the stimulus (0 is horizontal and values move counterclockwise).

stimEcc.Description: Distance from the center of the screen to the center of the stimulus.

stimRadius.Description: Radius of the isolated stimulus and center stimulus.

gapRatio.Description: Ratio of the surroundRadius that is used for a gap. Note that the width of the cosine ramp used for soft edges also affects the appearance of the gap slightly  - const.stimCosEdge_deg

stimType.Description: The type of stimulus texture to be used for center and surround.
